sourcesContent:
<script>
import axios from 'axios';
import RecipePreviewList from "../components/RecipePreviewList";

export default {
  name: 'SearchPage',
  data() {
    return {
      query: '',
      numberOfResults: 5,
      resultOptions: [5, 10, 15],
      selectedFilter: '',
      filterOptions: [
        { value: '', text: 'No filter' },
        { value: 'vegetarian', text: 'Vegetarian' },
        { value: 'vegan', text: 'Vegan' },
        { value: 'glutenFree', text: 'Gluten Free' },
      ],
      sortOption: '',
      sortOptions: [
        { value: '', text: 'No sorting' },
        { value: 'time', text: 'Preparation Time' },
        { value: 'popularity', text: 'Popularity' }
      ],
      recipes: []
    };
  },
  computed: {
    sortedRecipes() {
      if (this.sortOption === 'time') {
        return [...this.recipes].sort((a, b) => a.readyInMinutes - b.readyInMinutes);
      } else if (this.sortOption === 'popularity') {
        return [...this.recipes].sort((a, b) => b.aggregateLikes - a.aggregateLikes);
      }
      return this.recipes;
    }
  },
  components: {
    RecipePreviewList,
  },
  methods: {
    async searchRecipes() {
      // עדכון כתובת ה-URL לפנייה לשרת שלך
      const url = `${this.$root.store.server_domain}/recipes/search`; // עדכן לפי השרת שלך
      
      try {
        const response = await axios.get(url, {
          params: {
            query: this.query,
            number: this.numberOfResults,
            filter: this.selectedFilter,
            sort: this.sortOption,
          },
        });

        let results = response.data.results;

        if (this.selectedFilter) {
          results = results.filter(recipe => recipe[this.selectedFilter]);
        }

        this.recipes = results;
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error fetching recipes:', error);
      }
    },
    viewRecipe(recipeId) {
      this.$router.push({ name: 'RecipeDetail', params: { id: recipeId } });
    }
  }
};
</script>
